title: STAIR2 Function Block
description:
FINDB_NUM searches STR from right to left and returns the
last position that is a number.
Numbers are the letters "0..9" and "."
name: STAIR2

input.name: X
input.description: The input real value that needs to be rounded.

input.name: D
input.description: The step size for the rounding operation. Must be a positive real number to perform the stair-step calculation.

output.name: Y
output.description: The output real value after applying the stair-step rounding logic based on inputs X and D.
